Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Recent news
(Pinned) I am currently on the program committee of ISSTA 2024, ICSE 2024, FSE 2023 Industry Track, COLING 2022, Scala 2022, FSE 2022 industry track, and ICSME 2022 industry track. Please consider submitting a paper!

2023/07. One research paper on issue link recovery was accepted by ASE 2023. Congratulations to Chenyuan!

2023/06. One research paper on code search utilizing ChatGPT was accepted by ICSME 2023. Congratulations to Lianghong!

2023/05. Four research papers were accepted by ISSTA 2023. Congratulations to Ensheng, Hao, Queping, and Yifan!

2023/05. Our research project MemoryBank for enhancing LLMs with long-term memory was released, check it out!

2023/04. Our benchmark AGIEval for accessing foundation models was released, check it out!

2022/12. New paper accepted at ICSE 2023.

2022/11. New paper accepted at AAAI 2023.

2022/10. New paper accepted at WSDM 2023.

2022/03. New paper accepted at MSR 2022.

2022/02. Two papers accepted at ACL 2022.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Yanlin Wang's Homepage

Assistant Professor
School of Software Engineering
Sun Yat-sen University
E-mail: yanlin-wang AT outlook DOT com

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.

About me
I joined Software Engineering School, Sun Yat-sen University as an assistant professor in July 2022. Before that, I worked at Microsoft Research Asia, Data, Knowledge, and Intelligence (DKI) group as a senior researcher. I was very fortunate to work under the supervision of Dr. Dongmei Zhang and Shi Han in MSRA. I received my B.S. degree from Zhejiang University and PhD degree from the University of Hong Kong under the supervision of Prof. Bruno C. d. S. Oliveira.

My research interests include software engineering, deep learning, and programming languages, particularly in intelligent software engineering. Our group is always recruiting undergraduate/master students. Please contact me with your CV attached if you are interested in the above topics.
